name: Tobias and the Angel
description: Tobias and the Angel; Master of Guillaume Lambert (French, active about 1475 - 1485); Lyon, France; 1478 (based on date included in Easter calculation); Tempera colors, gold paint, and iron gall ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with brown jansenist morocco; Leaf: 14.6 x 9.8 cm (5 3/4 x 3 7/8 in.); Ms. 10, fol. 186; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Tobias and the Angel
medium: Tempera colors, gold paint, and iron gall ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with brown jansenist morocco
